Built-in UV sanitizer: Incorporate a UV sanitizer within the electric toothbrush to eliminate bacteria and viruses that can harbor in the bristles after use.

Multi-bristle heads: Offer interchangeable bristle heads for different oral care needs, such as sensitive teeth, whitening, or gum care. This allows users to customize their brushing experience based on their specific needs.
Smart battery indicator: Include a smart battery indicator that alerts users when the battery is low, ensuring they don't forget to replace it.
Built-in timer: Implement a built-in timer that ensures users brush for the recommended two minutes, promoting better oral hygiene habits.
Water-saving mode: Create a water-saving mode that uses less water per stroke, helping to conserve water and reduce the environmental impact of daily routines.
